title: Elizabeth Barrett Browning 1857 Letter to Napoleon

content.question: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Browning makes to achieve her purpose of petitioning Napoleon.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Browning makes to achieve her purpose of petitioning Napoleon.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
